title: Camille, the Steel Shadow, available now

replies.body: everyone will get used to her as usual same happens every damn release

"Cutting edge" you got that right this champion is more broken than literally any other champ on release like i just laned against her as gnar and 1 her slow is broken at early levels, her dash is about 4 times longer than gnar hop factoring in the hook pulling her to the wall and her ulti pushes allies out but her own can enter and leave as they please or they're already in the zone and her dash shouldnt stun either bc its stupidly op
the bundle is not 1270 RP, it is 1837 RP in my store
Disabled in custom games why? Is that just the beta client being fucking useless again?
